com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller

Class SignupController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller.SignupController

  • @Controller
public class SignupController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller deals with Signup activities. Contains method of showing signup-form and processing signup
    Since:
    2020-05-15
    Author:
    Sujan Kumar Mitra

    • Method Detail

      • initBinder

        @InitBinder
public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder webDataBinder)
        This method registers StringTrimmer in form. When a form is submitted, it trims all String type input fields
        Parameters:
        webDataBinder - instance of WebDataBinder (Populated by Spring)
        Since:
        2020-05-15

      • showSignup

        @GetMapping(value="/signup")
public java.lang.String showSignup(SignupUser signupUser)
        This method returns the view of signup page
        Parameters:
        signupUser - for form bindings (Populated by Spring)
        Returns:
        signup form
        Since:
        2020-05-15

      • signup

        @PostMapping(value="/signup")
public java.lang.String signup(@Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                              @Valid SignupUser signupUser,
                                                              org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                       throws UserAlreadyExistsException
        This method processes the signup submission.
        Parameters:
        signupUser - SignupUser data submitted in the form (populated by Spring Container)
        bindingResult - contains error related to form binding
        model - model object for putting model data (populated by Spring Container)
        Returns:
        on success login page, on error previous form with error attributes
        Throws:
        UserAlreadyExistsException - will throw this if user with email already exists.
        Since:
        2020-05-15
